content: get ready to crochet your very own adorable duckie squish with this easy-to-follow pattern perfect for beginners this pattern includes detailed written instructions and a helpful video tutorial worked in the round this crochet sphere pattern will guide you through creating a cute duck plushie that measures approximately 10 across add a touch of whimsy to your crochet collection with duckie squish **unique features-** easy level pattern suitable for beginners detailed written instructions and video tutorials included crocheted in the round adorable duck plushie design adds charm to your collection **materials needed-** us - l 8 0mm crochet hook - **susan bates** https //amzn to/3fojdo8 250 yds **bernat blanket** https //amzn to/4lkygp4 6 - super bulky **stitch markers** https //amzn to/45w22ap 24mm **safety eyes** https //amzn to/3bbr3nk 10 round microbead pillow - **amazon** https //amzn to/3arh99y or fiber fill
